body: I think it's more like consensual cuckold rather than NTR since he actually wants her to sleep with other men.
her art is god tier you know , the wife's smile is what i fapped on , the rest of it just bullshit

revolnop bruh you need to research first what "cuck" means. Actually, you might be one, who know??? But still, most people skip story cause they are weak minded as fúck and only fap to arts. Then why bother coming here?? Only cucks belong this place, wannabe and incels should go outside. Also normal people (who usually triggered).

Oh damn @kencoro you gave me a new angle on the story, if thats the case then it really sucks cause all of their suffering couldve been avoided with better communication...  tbh it feels like 90% of netorare could be avoided by better communication.  This ending is a bit dissapointing though - it wouldve been a lot better if at the end it had shown a pair of kids shoes next to the wife's instead, implying that the main couple had a child together like they wanted now that they're fucking again; sharply contrasting with the memory of the previous image where another mans shoes are there. Wouldve been a much happier end.

@revolnrop,
if I remember it (reading this years ago), the wife was the one leading him into insanity.
He was pressured by her side of the family for kids, while constantly failing.  His failure to father a child was what led him into this cucking insanity.
Eventually it was revealed by the wife herself, she is the one who blocked that process by being on birth control during their entire relationship because she didn't want to get pregnant by him.
My take, the wife made this hell herself and broke her husband in the process.  But in the end, this two insane people definitely deserves each other.
※ I didn't read this again, so I could be remembering it wrong.

I think most of these commentators just haven't read the full story. He is the one that constantly pushed for the cuckoldry, ntr. The wife in previous chapters wanted to stop many times and finally having enough wanted to divorce but the husband begged and the wife being stupid relented.
Then the husband had to escalate stuff hence having his own dad cuck him. Wife's dad sees them, hell ensues. They divorce, separate. Husband tries to find her which leads to this ending.
This husband is worse than any bull in any NTR. He is not a cuck, a simple asshole he twisted his wife, their parents and who knows how many others.
Are we missing a chapter? This one just doesnt quite feel right

Why would you post the last chapter before the second to last? I came here to hate the woman, not the man. Now I hate them both, but I don't have any justification to hate the woman because you opted not to translate the chapter before this.

Well... at least this fucking loser to grow some pair and take her back, but still, he is still being a cuck. I hope his whore of a wife doesn't get pregnant with a random asshole kid and he end up taking care of that spawn.

The ending is just what I'd thought it would be...but anyway this story sh*ts every other NTR story...this one actually has characters with brains and they actually make reasonable decisions...truly the best NTR  I've ever read.
